column2: Flint is abundant and easy to come by in this region.
Coal is abundant in this region, and easily exploited.
Copper deposits allows for construction of higher tier blacksmiths (1-7) within this province.
The presence of tin deposits allows for construction of higher tier blacksmiths (1-7) within this province.
The presence of iron in this province allows for higher tier weaponsmiths (1-6), armoursmiths (1-6) and blacksmiths (1-7) within this province.
The presence of steel  in this province allows for higher tier weaponsmiths (1-7), armoursmiths (1-7) and blacksmiths (1-7) within this province.
Upgrades the infrastructure in the region, allowing for greater investment into local baronies, but at great cost.
Improves the road networks through targeted investments, bolstering trade, and reducing the cost of future investments.
